replies.body:
Tell me why no pro POT pvper went over 20 cps? They mc all day long and never even hit 17 cps.

Also G Cheat bans everyone over 18 cps, same as antiskid. There is no way you can hit that cps legit.

This is coming from someone who tried every clicking technique and even got accused by major OCN players for autoclicking (used the trackpad to archieve 20+ cps with 5 finger and just straightlined).

The most high you can get legit is around 15 - 17, with butterfly only for some seconds like 18 or 19 if you do this with a halve broken mouse like me.
